title: Roti & Reps
description: An AI-powered web app that generates personalized Desi meal plans with recipes, helping users balance fitness goals with traditional South Asian cuisine.

title: AnonyMessage
description: A web app that lets users send anonymous messages to registered users, built to encourage fun, private, and open communication.

title: Music Academy
description: A responsive front-end website designed for a music academy, showcasing courses, instructors, and contact details. Explores many components from Accertainity UI

title: Linkfree
description: A Linktree-inspired web app that lets users create a personalized page to share multiple profile and social media links in one place.

title: Weather App
description: A simple weather app showing real-time weather updates of cities all around the globe.
